channel.title: Regression on Luyao Peng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on Luyao Peng's Blog

item.title: R Package “regrrr”: Compiling and Visualizing Regression Results
item.description:
This is an R package “regrrr” on Cran I coauthored with Rui Yang. In strategy/management research, we always need to compile the regression results into the publishable format and sometimes plot the moderating effects. This package does the job. Here is the quickstart guide.
Installation To install from CRAN: install.packages("regrrr") library(regrrr) You can also use devtools to install the latest development version: devtools::install_github("raykyang/regrrr") library(regrrr) Examples compile the correlation table library(regrrr) ## Warning: package 'regrrr' was built under R version 3.
